"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Nyankopɔn ne mba hun nyimpa mbabaa no dɛ hɔn ho yɛ fɛw; na wɔwarwaar hɔn mu dza wɔpɛ nyinara."
"Na EWURADZE see dɛ
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: Mo sunsum nnkɛnye nyimpa edzi aper daa
, #Job 1.6; 2.1": osiandɛ ɔyɛ honam ara. Ofi dɛm ber yi ne nda bɛyɛ mfe ɔha eduonu."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Nda no mu no nna eso n’ekyir no
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: nna abran akɛse wɔ asaase do
, #Job 1.6; 2.1": osiandɛ ber a Nyankopɔn ne mba nye nyimpa mbabaa hyiae no

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na EWURADZE hun dɛ nyimpa n’emumuyɛ ayɛ kɛse wɔ asaase do
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: na dɛ n’akoma mu nsusui nyinara yɛ bɔn ara nko daa no

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "EWURADZE nuu noho dɛ ɔyɛɛ nyimpa wɔ asaase do
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: na ɔyɛɛ no yaw wɔ n’akoma mu."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na EWURADZE see dɛ
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: Mebɛsɛɛ nyimpa a mabɔ no no efi asaase enyi: nyew
column5: nye mbowa nyinara; osiandɛ menu moho dɛ mayɛ hɔn."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Naaso Noa dze
"Iyinom nye Noa no ho asɛm. Nna Noa yɛ nyimpa tseneneenyi na odzi mu wɔ n’ebusuasantsen mu: Noa nye Nyankopɔn nantsewee."
"Na Noa woo mbanyin baasa
"Nna asaase asɛɛ wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim
"Na Nyankopɔn hwɛɛ asaase
column5: asɛɛ; osiandɛ nyimpa asɛɛ no kwan wɔ asaase do."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na Nyankopɔn see Noa dɛ
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: Abɔdze nyinara n’ewiei edu m’enyim; osiandɛ ɔnam hɔn do na ewurkadze ahyɛ asaase do ma; na hwɛ
, #Job 1.6; 2.1": mebɛsɛɛ hɔn nyinara nye asaase so."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Fa dua pa pam hɛn ma woho; yɛ adan wɔ hɛn no mu
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: na fa ihua tar no mu nye n’ekyir."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na mbrɛ ibesi ayɛ no nye yi: ehɛn no ne tsentsen basafa ɔha eduonum
"Yɛ ntokura wɔ hɛn no ho
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: na wie no anamɔn kor na fa wɔ sor; na hɛn no n’abow no fa si ne nkyɛnmu; yɛ no nsamdo

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na hwɛ
, #Job 1.6; 2.1": medze nsuyirii reba asaase do abɛsɛɛ abɔdze a nkwahom wɔ mu nyinara efi sor ase: adze a ɔwɔ asaase do nyinara bowu."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na menye wo bedzi ahyɛmu: na aba hɛn no mu
column6: nye wo mba hɔn yernom ka wo ho."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na fa honam nyinara mu adze a nkwa wɔ mu n’ahorow nyinara mu ebien ebien bra hɛn no mu
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: ma wonnya nkwa nka wo ho; fa hɔn onyin nye ɔber."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Ntumbowa ahorow
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: fiembowa ahorow nye mbowa ahorow nyinara hɔn mu ebien ebien bra wo nkyɛn; ama woeenya nkwa."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na fa edziban nyinara bi ma woho
na wɔwoo mbabaa maa hɔn no: na boa ano kɔ wo nkyɛn; ama ɔaayɛ edziban ama ɔwo nye hɔn."

"Na ɔbaa dɛ nyimpa hyɛɛ ase dɔree wɔ as: "Na Noa yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no nyinara pɛpɛɛpɛr."
